document.full_text: holder aravane rezai slumped to a 6-3 3-6 6-4 defeat by qualifier sofia arvidsson in the first round of the madrid open on sunday.
document.title: holder rezai eliminated in madrid open first round
lines_and_colors: holder aravane rezai slumped to a 6-3 3-6 6-4 defeat by qualifier sofia arvidsson in the first round of the madrid open on sunday.
